name: Rainbow Pigeon
description: Wanted by the SEE-IA for crimes against humanity. Has a personal stockpile of illegally obtained credit card numbers.

name: Ice Pigeon
description: A special kind of drone that can fly in the cold. It is used for espionage campaigns in the Arctic.

name: Egyptian Swift Pigeon
description: A pigeon that can fly at speeds of up to 100 mph. It is used for espionage campaigns in the Middle East.
